transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Maam good evening maam.
Customer: Yaaru?
Executive: Na Krishna pesura India martlende manager pesura eppadi irukinga?
Customer: Hmm sollunga enna vishayam?
Executive: Eppadi irukinga maam?
Customer: Neenga yaarunga?
Executive: Na India mart employee pesurenga.
Customer: Kekuthungala?
Executive: Okay endha related call pannirukinga?
Customer: So related than last time rendu naaluku munnadi Rohini nu solli executive pesinangale.
Customer: Theriyaliye en husband call pannunga.
Executive: Sorry primary number iruku adhu sir number thane maam 390 mudiyuthu le.
Customer: Last 107 than.
Executive: Illa ungal number onnu irukule maam 90 start aagi 390 mudiyuthu le.
Customer: Appadi edhum illingge.
Executive: Seri maam onnum illa number sollunga.
Customer: Sollunga.
Executive: Oru nimisham.
Executive: Maam 9025648390.
Customer: Enna number?
Executive: 90256
Customer: 256
Executive: 48
Customer: 48
Executive: 390.
Customer: Oh okay appo andha numberke neenga call panni pesunga.
Executive: Okay maam onnum illai.
Customer: Manager call pannunga.
Executive: Okay okay irundhaalum maam oru theriyama vandhu customer care call pannitanga appadinnu solli inform pannanga.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aama maam adhu andha concern vandhu close panna confirmation kaaga inform panna maari irukanga avarukku illa message panna hospital irukka neenga pesalaamnu solli irundhanga.
Customer: Appadingala avar thoongittu irukkaaru.
Executive: Appadi onnum prachnai illai maam avarukku andha concern thaan close pannitukura just inform pannurathukkaaga thaan call pannom.
Customer: Seri okaynga close pannidunga.
Executive: India mart neenga use panreengala maam?
Customer: Aa use panren.
Executive: Okay okay so regulara use panna sollunga edhaavathu doubt maari kooda namma account manager Rohini nu solli iruppanga.
Customer: Hmm hmm okay.
Executive: Neenga use panreengala neenga individual use panreengala illa avar thaan paakaraara?
Customer: Illa illa rendu perume use pannittu irukkaanga.
Executive: Oh seri maam okay maam okay edhaavathu doubt irundha Rohini nu solli call pannuvanga avangalukku support idhu respond panna sollunga edhaavathu support naalum avanga pannuvanga okayngala.
Customer: Seri okay okay.
Executive: Okay andha concern close pannidunga adhu oru related feedback maari vandhu varum adhaiyum koduthurunga okayngala.
Customer: Hmm okay.
Executive: Okay maam okay vera edhaavathu doubts irukka maam India mart pathi so far eppadi poittu irukku.
Customer: Illa illa vera edhum doubt illai.
Executive: Seri maam okay maam.
Customer: Okay thank you.
Executive: Thank you maam thank you vachiranga.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a call by mistake.

- Wants to close the concern.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the concern was closed.

- Executive asked to provide feedback.

- Executive offered support from account manager Rohini.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call, support, feedback, account manager
